Class DeliveryController

java.lang.Object
kkadak.fujitsutask.controller.DeliveryController
@RestController public class DeliveryController extends Object
REST controller for the delivery fee calculation and rules management

  • Method Details

    • getFee

      @GetMapping("/getFee") public String getFee(@RequestParam(value="mode",required=false) String modeStr, @RequestParam(value="id",required=false) String idStr, @RequestParam(value="type",required=false) String typeStr, @RequestParam(value="metric",required=false) String metricStr, @RequestParam(value="value",required=false) String valueStr, @RequestParam(value="amount",required=false) String amountStr, @RequestParam(value="city",required=false) String cityStr, @RequestParam(value="vehicle",required=false) String vehicleStr, @RequestParam(value="time",required=false) String timestampStr)
      REST endpoint handler for delivery fee calculation and rule management
      Parameters:
      modeStr - optional parameter to specify action mode for rule management, in case missing, default fee calculation is assumed, valid options are: "reset", "print", "remove", "add"
      idStr - specifies the ID of the rule to be removed in case modeStr is set to "remove"
      typeStr - specifies the type of rule to be added in case modeStr is set to "add", valid options are: "base", "from", "until", "phenomenon", translated to ExtraFeeRuleValueType in case of extra fee using StringEnumTranslator
      metricStr - specifies the metric for which the rule to be added applies, translated to ExtraFeeRuleMetric using StringEnumTranslator
      valueStr - the value from/until/to which the rule to be added applies
      amountStr - the fee amount for the rule to be added
      cityStr - the city for the price calculation or in which the base rule to be added applies, translated to City using StringEnumTranslator
      vehicleStr - the vehicle for the price calculation or for which rule to be added applies, translated to VehicleType using StringEnumTranslator
      timestampStr - the timestamp to be used in case a query is made for the past, measured in seconds past epoch
      Returns:
      the response output, delivery fee calculation result in case mode is unset or other output in case of rule management
